name: Kankū Dai
description: Kankū Dai means 'to look at the sky - large', and in the first movement one directs the gaze upward. Kankū Dai symbolizes defending against eight opponents and is the longest kata in Shōtōkan (65 movements in total). Of the five kata that belong to shodan level in SKIF and are used as shitei-kata at WUKF championships (Bassai Dai, Jion, Empi, Jitte and Kanku Dai), it is also the most varied with several kicks, movements at all levels from lying down (ryote fuse) to jumping, left and right flying kicks (nidan geri) and a technically demanding turn after mae geri to manji uke in kokutsu dachi. Almost all movements in the Heian kata, created by Yasutsune Itosu, originate from Kanku Dai. This kata was Gichin Funakoshi's favorite and was previously called Koshokun and Kushankun after Kung Siang Chun, who is believed to have developed it. He was a Chinese diplomat sent by Emperor Ming and also an expert in kempo (Chinese boxing).

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: むすびだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, step out to hachiji-dachi position and assume the ready stance (yōi)

moves.japaneseName: Ryō shō kasaneta mama hitai naname ue ni

subMoves.hiragana: かいしん
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち
subMoves.description: Hands together - outermost of index and middle fingers on right hand overlap left - from here hands are led upward - gaze follows when hands pass. Opening movement to 'observe' and 'I have no weapons'

moves.japaneseName: Ittan ryō shō sayū ni hiraki – ryō shō kafukubu mae e

subMoves.hiragana: ひらき / あわせ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち
subMoves.description: Open hands to the sides - gather them in front of the stomach, moving circularly down and meeting with right hand edge against left palm

moves.japaneseName: Hidari haiwan hidari sokumen jōdan uke – migi shō mune mae kamae

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Left high level knife hand block to the left in back stance. Nukite at solar plexus should point upward

moves.japaneseName: Migi haiwan migi sokumen jōdan uke – hidari shō mune mae kamae

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Opposite side right high level knife hand block in back stance. Hikite hand horizontal in front of solar plexus

moves.japaneseName: Hidari chūdan tate shutō uke – migi ken migi koshi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり たて しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: しぜんたい
subMoves.description: Pull up to shizentai - left middle level vertical knife hand block, right hand pulled hikite to the side

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ちょくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: しぜんたい
subMoves.description: Same stance - right middle level straight punch

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: With same arm - right middle level inside block - weight shift to the left in a relatively broad zenkutsu-dachi-like stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ちょくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: しぜんたい
subMoves.description: Shizentai - left middle level straight punch

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: With same arm left middle level inside block - weight shift to the right in high zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: こしがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり かたあしだち
subMoves.description: Pull up for keage - one leg stance on left leg, right foot at left knee, hands in koshi gamae on left side

moves.japaneseName: Migi uraken jōdan yoko mawashi-uchi – migi yoko keage

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこけあげ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり かたあしだち
subMoves.description: Right side kick

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うらけん じょうだん うち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right back fist high level strike

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Opposite direction left middle level knife hand block in back stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward right middle level knife hand block in back stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward left middle level knife hand block in back stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi nukite chūdan-zuki – hidari shō osae-uke

subMoves.hiragana: おさえうけ / しほんぬきて
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left pressing block followed by right middle level four-finger spear hand in right zenkutsu-dachi. KIAI

moves.japaneseName: Migi shutō jōdan yoko mawashi-uchi – hidari shō hitai mae jōdan uke

subMoves.hiragana: しゅとうまわしうち / あげうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees turn right high level knife hand circular strike and left high level knife hand rising block in zenkutsu-dachi with gyaku hanmi hips

moves.japaneseName: Jōtai sono mama - migi mae keage

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ じょうだん まえげり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right front kick - upper body unchanged

moves.japaneseName: Migi ken migi sokumen jōdan uchi uke – hidari ken hidari sokumen gedan uke

subMoves.hiragana: まんじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees turn right high level inside block and left low level block in back stance. After mae-geri, center of gravity drops dramatically down into kokutsu-dachi

moves.japaneseName: Migi shutō gedan uchi-komi – hidari shō migi kata ue nagashi-uke

subMoves.hiragana: ながしうけ / しゅとううちこみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left deflecting block and right low level knife hand strike in left zenkutsu-dachi. Extend back leg so weight moves into zenkutsu-dachi

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken gedan ni nobasi – migi ken migi koshi

subMoves.hiragana: げだんがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり しぜんたい
subMoves.description: Slowly pull up to left shizentai low ready position. Principle of 'ō-komite'

moves.japaneseName: Migi shutō jōdan yoko mawashi-uchi – hidari shō hitai mae jōdan uke

subMoves.hiragana: しゅとうまわしうち / あげうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ちょくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right middle level straight punch in same stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi jōdan ura-zuki – hidari shō migi tekubi yoko-zoe - migi hiza ate

subMoves.hiragana: うらづき / ひざがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり かたあしだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees turn right reverse punch with knee ready position in one leg stance. Arms move forward from each side of right thigh, left ends as support for right ura-zuki resting against wrist

subMoves.hiragana: りょうてふせ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎあしまえふせ
subMoves.description: With right foot forward, go down and place hands (formed as a triangle in relation to each other) on the floor - back foot rests on whole sole. Both soles are on the ground, gaze directed at a point about 4 meters ahead

moves.japaneseName: Hidari shutō gedan-barai – migi shutō mune mae kamae

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり しゅとうげだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees turn low block with left knife hand - right lies hikite in front of solar plexus in deep back stance. Hips should be about as low as in previous position

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward right middle level knife hand block in (normal) back stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: 270 degrees turn left middle level inside block in left zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right middle level reverse punch in same stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees turn right middle level inside block in right zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left middle level reverse punch in same stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ちょくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right middle level straight punch in same stance

subMoves.hiragana: こしがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだりあしだち
subMoves.description: Pull up to koshi gamae, hands at left hip

moves.japaneseName: Migi uraken jōdan yoko mawashi-uchi – migi yoko keage

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ よこけあげ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり かたあしだち
subMoves.description: Right side kick

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うらけん じょうだん うち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right back fist high level circular strike

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん しゅとううけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees turn left middle level knife hand block in back stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi shihon nukite chūdan-zuki – hidari shō osae-uke

subMoves.hiragana: おさえうけ / しほんぬきて
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward right middle level four-finger spear hand in right zenkutsu-dachi - left pressing block on the way

moves.japaneseName: Hidari uraken tate mawashi-uchi – migi ken migi koshi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり うらけん じょうだん うち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees behind around self left high level back fist strike in horse stance. No excessive tempo changes in the movement

moves.japaneseName: Hidari kentsui chūdan yoko uchi – sono mama hidari ni yori ashi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり けんついよこうち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Yori-ashi (glide in stance) to the left, left middle level hammer fist side strike in horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ えんぴまえうち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Right middle level elbow strike to the left in horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: こしがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Look opposite - hands in koshi gamae on left side

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Right low level block - still in horse stance

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken gedan uke – migi ken furiage

subMoves.technique: Ryō ude mawashi uke / Sukui uke
subMoves.hiragana: りょううでまわしうけ / すくいうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり きばだち
subMoves.description: Both arms circular block, stepping forward into left horse stance. Right hand should not be pulled too far - should be positioned to strike directly down

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ おとしづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Right dropping punch in horse stance - downward strike with right hand, back of hand outward, hand positioned behind left so wrists cross each other

moves.japaneseName: Ryō shō atama ue kōsa uke

subMoves.hiragana: じょうだん こうさうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: しぜんたい
subMoves.description: Pull up to shizentai - high level cross block above head with open hands, backs of hands toward each other. Practice sequence from kōsa uke so it can be performed fluidly

subMoves.hiragana: みぎまわり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: With right leg as pivot point, turn right to right zenkutsu-dachi - hands in same position

subMoves.hiragana: じゅうじがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Hands lower down past jaw and in front of chest - close on the way - same stance

moves.japaneseName: Nidan-geri – migi uraken tate mawashi-uchi – hidari ken hidari koshi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり とびげり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: とび
subMoves.description: First kick in nidan flying kick combination. KIAI

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ とびげり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: とび
subMoves.description: Second kick in nidan flying kick combination

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うらけん たてまわしうち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right back fist vertical circular strike in right zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: はちじだち
subMoves.description: Pivot clockwise on right foot, bringing left foot beside it to face the front. Sweep Gedan with outer right forearm (fist down), then circle (big) both fists upward, crossing before face. In Hachiji-dachi, lower fists in front of thighs, backs forward.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: むすびだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs
